meanings.definition: A delay in the ignition of gunpowder after the trigger has been pulled.
meanings.sent1: The soldier was surprised by the hangfires in his rifle during training.
meanings.sent2: The gunsmith warned about the potential danger of hangfires in old firearms.
meanings.sent3: The hangfires in the musket made the historical reenactment more realistic.
meanings.sent4: The hangfires in the cannon symbolized the unpredictability of war.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hangfires lingered in the air after the battle.
